title: Implement timeout monitoring and debugging tools
description: Create comprehensive timeout detection, logging, and debugging capabilities to identify and resolve performance bottlenecks in API requests and system operations
iWant: detailed timeout monitoring and debugging information
soThat: I can identify and fix timeout issues within 5 minutes of detection
acceptanceCriteria: System logs all timeout events with detailed context and stack traces
Dashboard displays real-time timeout metrics and trends
Automated alerts trigger when timeout thresholds are exceeded
Debug mode provides step-by-step execution timing for slow operations
